author: Confucius
message: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.
title: Thought of the day

author: Nikola Tesla
message: Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more.
title: Thought of the day

author: Leo Aikman
message: Blessed is the person who is too busy to worry in the daytime, and too sleepy to worry at night.
title: Thought of the day

author: Pablo Picasso
message: He can who thinks he can, and he can't who thinks he can't. This is an inexorable, indisputable law.
title: Thought of the day
